subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=113|rad=示|as=04|sn=9|canj=IFJE|four=|ids=⿰礻支}}

# name of a mountain (of warship)
# (same as [[禔]]) happiness, good fortune, good luck, blessing
# (same as standard form [[祓]]) to exorcise, to remove evil, to cleanse, to clean, to wash away
